name: Chris Fichman's Professional Page
body:
My name is Chris, and this website showcases some of my work, in addition to personal interests in the field of computer science. Please take a moment to look around!

![It's so fluffy!](https://scontent-a.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/1456020_2067957018406_695680982_n.jpg)

#About Me
I'm a Senior Computer Science Major at the University of Colorado. While I'm primarily interested in computer graphics and modeling, I also have experience using C at the Operating/Network System level. In addition, I've recently learned to use Ruby on Rails. You'll find some of my work under the Projects link below.


#Site Content
[Resume](/resume.html) - Links to resumes

[Projects](/projects.html) - Links to my current projects

[Social](/social.html) - Currently just a link to my LinkedIn page. I'll have links to Quora, stackoverflow, and others soon.

Personal - Some non-computer science information about me(Coming Soon).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
